project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Build a text-based game in Python where players can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and face simple challenges.

task.name: Create item system for picking up and using items
Implement inventory management for the player
Develop simple challenges for the player to encounter
Write tests for game mechanics including navigation, item pickups, and challenges
Execute tests to ensure all features work correctly
